documentation.author: Cerner
documentation.purpose: The purpose of this rule is to place a clinical event of Estimated Gestational Age on the clinical event table when blood pressure is documented.
documentation.explanation: When the rule finds a qualifying event of a systolic blood pressure, AND the patient is also pregnant, the rule will run a script to get the final ega from the pregnancy_estimate table/est_gest_age_days field in the Women’s Health Data Model. If an EGA is found, the rule will place that final EGA on the clinical event table for that date. If the blood pressure is documented twice in the same day, the EGA result will be updated for same-day results. Otherwise, a new EGA result will be calculated and only 1 EGA result per day will ever exist.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement: eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go /* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_DEBUGEKM_E
templateDefinitions.description: Turn debug messaging on or off

statements.statement:
select debug_status = if (d.seq = 1) "On for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Off for subsequent Evoke Templates" elseif (d.seq = 3) "On for all Logic Templates" elseif (d.seq = 4) "On for all Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 5) "On for all Logic and Action Templates" elseif (d.seq = 6) "To FullAudit for this module only" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Additional EKSDATA logging" ENDIF, _hidden = if (d.seq = 1) 1 elseif (d.seq=2) 0 elseif (d.seq=3) 2 elseif (d.seq=4) 3 elseif (d.seq=5) 4 elseif (d.seq=6) 5 elseif (d.seq=7) 6 endif
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = VALUE(7))

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULT_INCOMING_REQ_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1 and OPT_VALUE2

statements.statement:
eks_codeset_cki_refhelp "8","CKI","*ANY_STATUS" go
/* select distinct Result_Status = if (t.seq = 1) cv.description else "*ANY_STATUS" endif, _hidden = if (t.seq = 1) cv.code_value else 0.0 endif from code_value cv, (dummyt t with seq=2) plan cv where cv.code_set = 8 and cv.active_ind = 1 and cv.cdf_meaning > " " join t order Result_Status */

eks_event_set_name_refhelp PAR1, "EVENT_SET" go
/* SELECT IF (PAR1="*ANY") EVENT_SET_NAME="*ANY_EVENT_SET_NAME" ELSEIF (PAR1="ALL") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") EVENT_SET_NAME = V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) =PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ELSE EVENT_SET_NAME= V.EVENT_SET_NAME FROM V500_EVENT_SET_CODE V WHERE CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,V.EVENT_SET_NAME)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ORDER cnvtupper(V.EVENT_SET_NAME) ENDIF */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_DEMOGRAPHIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: patient's DEMOGRAPHIC is in OPT_CODED_VALUES or city/zip code is OPT_TEXT_VALUE

column.value: County of business mailing address (Code set 74)

statements.statement: select FreeText = FillString(40, " ") from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_AGE_EVAL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Person's age is EVALUATION AGE1 UNIT1 and OPT_AGE2 OPT_UNIT2 using person from OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_PROBLEMS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE for person LINK. Optionally narrow problem matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_MOST_RECENT_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the most recent result for EVENT_SET_NAME is EVALUATION VALUE1 for the same encounter as OPT_LINK over the last OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_EXEC_CCL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: Execute PROGRAM_NAME with parameters OPT_PARAM and link to OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_RESULT_UNITS (with OPT_NUM_DEC_PLACES decimal places) on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert.OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_UPDATE_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create an updated STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY result of OPT_VALUE1 OPT_RESULT_UNITS (with OPT_NUM_DEC_PLACES decimal places) for the event in template LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert

values.value: To FullAudit for this module only

value.value: select ce.verified_dt_tm@NEWLINEfrom clinical_event ce@NEWLINEwhere ce.clinical_event_id = @CLINICALEVENTID:{Existing} @NEWLINE and ce.verified_dt_tm between cnvtdatetime(curdate, 0000) and cnvtdatetime(curdate, 2359)@NEWLINEhead report@NEWLINE log_misc1 = "NOTFOUND"@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINE log_misc1 = "FOUND"@NEWLINEwith nocounter, nullreport go@NEWLINE

select ce.verified_prsnl_id from clinical_event ce@NEWLINE@NEWLINEplan ce where ce.clinical_event_id = @CLINICALEVENTID:{Trigger}@NEWLINE@NEWLINEdetail@NEWLINE@NEWLINE log_misc1 = build2(ce.verified_prsnl_id)@NEWLINE@NEWLINEwith nocounter go
parser("select where 1=1 detail event_updt_id = @misc1:{USR}, log_misc1 = ^@misc1:{USR}^ go")
parser("select where 1=1 detail event_updt_id = @misc1:{USR}, log_misc1 = ^@misc1:{USR}^ go")
